item.title: ‘Airport Theory’ Will Make You Miss Your Flight
item.description: This delusional airport trend only appeals to those who have no concept of how time or space work. Here’s how to actually travel like a pro.

item.title: Everything You Say to Your Echo Will Soon Be Sent to Amazon, and You Can’t Opt Out
item.description: Amazon is killing its “Do Not Send Voice Recordings” privacy feature on March 28 as the company aims to bolster Alexa+, its new subscription assistant...
